greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of binary matrices with a total of n ones, distinct columns each with the same number of ones and nonzero rows in nonincreasing lexicographic order.
comment: The condition that the rows be in nonincreasing order is equivalent to considering nonequivalent matrices up to permutation of rows.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jan 15 2020
